item.title: More WiFi without internet on a Southwest flight
item.description: After reading James Vaughan’s write-up about what he could do with a connection to the flightâ€™s WiFi without access to the internet, and an upcoming Southwest flight of my own, I’d thought I’d replicate his findings and see what else was lurking around the airlines’ network. First, the data collection: while true; do http getconnected.southwestwifi.com/current.json | jq > current_$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M).json; sleep 60; done I started this maybe 30 minutes into my flight so wasn’t able to get the full duration, but at the end the data checks out!
